ETO.JO.summary: Etion Limited provides original design manufacturing, safety and productivity, digital network, and cyber security solutions in South Africa, Australia, the rest of Africa, and the Middle East. The company designs, develops, and manufactures various electronic and digital technologies for external customers; and develops customized and generic electronic subsystems, as well as products for clients in the aerospace and defense, cyber security, mining, industrial, and transportation sectors. It also provides digital safety and environment management systems that include IoT devices and custom software for transport and logistics, mining, and energy sectors; and offers asset management and maintenance services. In addition, the company offers connectivity and communications products and solutions for fiber and wireless deployment, data and digital radio communications networks, network monitoring, and power-related infrastructure, as well as services for data center environments; and cybersecurity solutions and services, such as SSL certificates and certificate management systems, FIDO certified strong authentication, digital signature and approval solutions, managed public key infrastructure, biometric enrolment and matching systems, and insider threat prevention solutions. The company was formerly known as Ansys Limited. Etion Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Centurion, South Africa.
